attributes.contentHtml:
Here’s a long story about Donzee/ ** donzee529#1000**.
so long time ago idk when. He was wanting help making an hosting company named poly hosting.
she I helped and all that then let’s skip talking about poly hosting. He made an new host named atlas hosting then took it down I found out that he was a underage person I searched his name and saw a school project with a photo of him. I sent it to him and he said it was his "custin ". And I have seen his face before on discord when he accidentally clicked video. He says his 15/16. Then there was drama about me with much stuff. Then HE made a discord bot list named discordland.gg. But let’s get into real stuff. I found out so much about him.
